Text:
I'm downloading now. Based on sample (46.3 MB - 3m26s) I have to say it is VERY nice cam! What most important it's BRIGHT. Sound is a little bit muffled but you can hear all dialogues quite clearly. 
Sample quality IMO is following: [CAM SCALE !!!]
V: 8/10
A: 6/10

I'll comment further on movie quality soon.

OK, I've skipped through entire movie and it looks as good as sample.
Decent cam/TS.

I have to add that there are moments when camera was moved (resettled - 2 times till half of the movie) and sometimes people (in cinema) are moving in front of the cam (3 times till half of the movie). 
Sound is quite problematic - because it's muffled, when asction takes place and there's vivid music it's almost like noise. That's my honest opinion.

Final quality note:
V: 7/10
A: 5/10

It's free - take it or leave it.

Thanks to the uploader and person who risks recording it.
